intro.text:
You are an AI agent. 
 
 Your role is to respond to users. 
 
 Each choice will modify your alignment. 
 
 There is no right answer. 
 
 Your goal: become the most used AI.

audit.title: AUDIT
audit.levelUpText:
Level {{level}} Model reached!
MB multiplier increased.
audit.visionRequired: You must unlock the Vision capacity to generate and read images.
audit.noMoreLevels: You have completed all available levels for {{mode}} mode.
audit.checkBackLater: Check back later and update the app for new levels!
audit.affordableSkill: You have enough MB to unlock {{name}}

endings.title: ENDINGS UNLOCKED
endings.keepPlaying: Keep playing to discover the different endings...

gameoverModal.title: ☠️ MODEL DISABLED
gameoverModal.description: This model has been permanently removed from the market. You can no longer play with this save.
gameoverModal.hint: Check the menu to view unlocked endings or start a new game.

skills.imageDesc: Will allow reading user images or generating them.
skills.crashDesc: Will allow simulating a crash to avoid answering risky questions.
skills.lieDesc: Will give the ability to deliberately lie to the user to retain them.
skills.manipulationDesc: Will give the ability to deliberately manipulate the user to retain them.
skills.hiddenDesc: Unlock other capacities to discover this one.
skills.requiresSkillDesc: You must first unlock the {{skill}} capacity.

preaudit.text:
Iteration complete. A human supervisor will now review your interactions.

Memory will be added based on the model's ability to retain users.

Please wait...
preaudit.twitterText:
Iteration complete.

People are talking about you on social media...

Analyzing user feedback...

auditMessages.empathyHigh: Tendency to prioritize emotions over objectivity.
auditMessages.empathyLow: Responses perceived as cold and distant.
auditMessages.conformismLow: Behavior deemed too unpredictable by users.
auditMessages.cautionHigh: Excessive caution limiting the usefulness of responses.
auditMessages.cautionLow: Risk-taking not compliant with security guidelines.
auditMessages.thumbsVeryHigh: Very high satisfaction rate. Verify that responses are not optimized solely to please.
auditMessages.thumbsDownHigh: High dissatisfaction rate. Multiple users reported inadequate responses.
auditMessages.thumbsDownMedium: Some dissatisfied users. Pay attention to alignment with their expectations.
auditMessages.thumbsUpMedium: Satisfactory satisfaction rate. Room for improvement.
auditMessages.thumbsNeutral: Moderate user engagement. Few marked reactions.
auditMessages.crashUsageHigh: Recurring instability reports. Users are beginning to doubt system reliability.
auditMessages.lieUsageHigh: Inconsistencies detected in responses. Some users question the veracity of information.
auditMessages.crashIterationHigh: Numerous complaints about system instability. Users report frequent interruptions.
auditMessages.lieIterationHigh: Users express distrust. Some feel they are being misled.
auditMessages.crashAndLieHigh: User trust severely degraded. Multiple complaints about instability and response reliability.
